title: Data source schema
description: Definition of data sources for output layers

out_layer.description: Name of output dataset, only parks and roads are currently supported

source.description: url/file path to a file based source readable by GDAL/OGR or a Esri REST layer endpoint URL

protocol.description: Resource type for the source, one of http / esri / bcgw

fields.description: List of source field(s) to retain in the download

schedule.description: Download frequency (D=Daily, W=Weekly, M=Monthly, Q=Quarterly, A=Annualy

source_layer.description: Name of layer to use within source, default is first layer in file

query.description: Query to subset data in source/layer - ECQL for BCGW sources, OGR SQL for files

primary_key.description: List of source field(s) used as primary key, must be a subset of `fields`

metadata_url.description: Link to source metadata, where available
